name: Confined (Zoo)
description:
The feeling of an abandoned school. The unnerving feeling of not being alone. The haunting idea that you are truly alone. Explore this city and delve into the mysteries as to what happened to the many citizens of this small town, all the while wondering if this town is still as dead as it may seem.

Controls:

Spacebar - Jump
WASD - Move
ESC - Leave Game
E - Interact
C - Crouch Toggle

Developed By:

1. Zennith Boerger
2. Tyler Senne
3. Wally
4. Alijah Mallula
5. Ean
6. David

Note: The notes in this game are a little buggy right now and so in order to interact please aim directly at the center of the note and interact

*This Game is Still in Development and thus this is not the finished product*
